translation.en: I wrote that song for you.

translation.zh: 我对你一点歉意都没有

translation.en: And now, it's time for you to go to your phones
translation.zh: 现在大家拿出自己的手机

translation.en: and text in your votes to the numbers you see on your television screens.
translation.zh: 发短信投票给电视屏幕上的选手号码

translation.en: [Corin] And remember, you cannot vote for your own country.
translation.zh: 记住 不能给自己的国家投票
晚上好 欧洲歌唱大赛

translation.en: -Thank you. -What a wonderful show we have tonight.
translation.zh: -谢谢-今晚的演出真是太精彩了

translation.en: [woman on TV] Norway gives eight points to our neighbor Sweden.
translation.zh: 挪威要把8分投给我们的邻居瑞典
你好 欧洲歌唱大赛

translation.en: Coming to you live from Reykjavik, Iceland.
translation.zh: 我在冰岛雷克雅未克进行现场投票

translation.en: They were awful. Next year, it will be better. I promise.
translation.zh: 我们的选手太烂了明年情况会好很多 我保证

translation.en: We'll send someone else. Just anyone.
translation.zh: 我们会派别的人去 随便谁都行

translation.en: But here are the votes from the Icelandic jury.
translation.zh: 但这是来自冰岛评审团的投票

translation.en: [Neils on TV] And finally, 12 points go to the Netherlands.
translation.zh: 最后 我们的12分投给荷兰
…来自瑞士对欧洲歌唱大赛的投票

translation.en: Did we just hear "points for Iceland"?
translation.zh: 我们刚听到了“投给冰岛”吗？

translation.en: [woman on TV] Ten points go to Sweden, and 12 points to Greece.
[man on TV] Good evening, Europe. Hello, from Czech Republic.
translation.zh: 晚上好 欧洲大家好 我来自捷克共和国

translation.en: The moment you're all waiting for.
And our ten points go to...
The Eastern Bloc countries are giving votes to Iceland.
translation.zh: 东欧集团国家纷纷投票给冰岛
-等一下 他们在说冰岛吗？-冰岛

translation.en: Romania gives eight points to Iceland.
translation.zh: 罗马尼亚把8分投给冰岛

translation.en: France gives eight points to Iceland!
It will be up to the popular vote, but they are doing much better
translation.zh: 最后结果取决于大众投票但他们的成绩比赔率工作人员

translation.en: Okay, now Sasha, let's see how the popular vote went
translation.zh: 好了 萨莎 我们看看大众投票的情况

translation.en: and find out who has made it through to the finale.
translation.zh: 看谁能最终进入总决赛

translation.en: The first country through to the final night is...
translation.zh: 第一个进入总决赛之夜的国家是…

translation.en: The second country that will be going to the final is...
translation.zh: 第二个进入总决赛的国家是…
对 干得漂亮 克罗地亚！

translation.en: Corin, there are only two more countries that are going to make it into the final.
translation.zh: 科林 现在总决赛仅剩下两个席位

translation.en: It's okay, you still have chance.
translation.zh: 没关系 你还有机会

translation.en: But you have a lot of points.

translation.zh: 太好了 以色列！太棒了！

translation.en: And the last country that will make it
for the grand finale on Saturday night will be...
translation.zh: 周六晚上盛大总决赛的国家是…

translation.en: The numbers are in... Iceland is in?
translation.zh: 统计数字…冰岛进入总决赛了？

translation.en: I'm taking this rope that's loose and I'm rolling it around
translation.zh: 我在把这捆松散的绳子

translation.en: to make it like in a circle.
I'm going to become a fisherman.
And drink myself to death like a real Erickssong man.
translation.zh: 然后像埃里克松家的人一样喝死

translation.en: Rich, hairless Russian guy with a huge dingle-dong came between us.
translation.zh: 那个没毛、有着大屌的俄罗斯富豪横亘在我们中间
人生在世 难免有不如意

translation.en: Remember, give up on your dreams now while you're still young.
translation.zh: 记住了 趁着年轻赶紧放弃梦想！

translation.en: How can you be a fisherman if you're scared of the fish?
translation.zh: 你要是怕鱼 怎么当渔夫？

translation.en: -What, are you joking at me? -Joking at you?
translation.zh: -你在开我的玩笑嘛？-开你的玩笑？

translation.en: -No, I'm tired of it. -Tired of what?
translation.zh: -不 我受够了-受够什么了？

translation.en: I'm tired of you constantly making fun of everything that I do.
translation.zh: 我受够了不管我做什么你都会嘲弄我

translation.en: I've spent my whole life trying to earn your respect.
translation.zh: 我一辈子都在努力赢得你的尊重

translation.en: And you know what? I don't need it anymore.
translation.zh: 但你知道吗？我现在不需要了

translation.en: And if you're never going to respect me,
translation.zh: 如果你永远不会尊重我

translation.en: then, so be it. I don't need it, okay?
translation.zh: 那无所谓了 反正我不需要 好吗？

translation.en: -Lars. Lars, come here. -How do you get off this boat?
-Where is the exit? -[Erick] There is no exit.
-It's a boat, Lars. -How do you get off this thing?
translation.zh: -这是条船 拉斯-要怎么下船？

translation.en: Now what do you see over there? Hmm?
translation.zh: 你往那边看 能看到什么？

translation.en: And you have done something for Iceland.
Something none of us could ever do.
translation.zh: 我们这些人永远都做不到的贡献

translation.en: It has brought us all great pride.
translation.zh: 给我们带来了巨大的自豪感

translation.en: -No, it was a disaster. -Yes, but you did not quit.
translation.zh: -不 那就是场灾难-对 但你没有放弃

translation.en: You have Viking spirit in you.
translation.zh: 你身上有维京人的精神！
刚开始的时候我并不明白

translation.en: until you got back up on that stage
after that stupid hamster wheel went into the audience.
translation.zh: 在哪个破仓鼠轮失控跑到观众席之后

translation.en: You have always reminded me of your mother.
translation.zh: 你总是让我想起你的母亲

translation.en: She passed too soon for the both of us.
She would have been proud of you, Lars.
translation.zh: 她一定会为你感到自豪 拉斯

translation.en: I left Sigrit all alone. And now, she doesn't want me anymore.
translation.zh: 我把西格莉特一个人丢在了那里现在她也不想要我了

translation.en: We've had bad luck with the Ericksdóttir women.
translation.zh: 我们跟埃里克斯多蒂尔家的女人一向合不来
西格莉特的母亲 赫尔卡…

translation.en: Never wanted anything to do with me.
translation.zh: 从不想跟我有任何瓜葛
我一直都很喜欢西格莉特

translation.en: -How did I let this happen? -Oh, it doesn't matter what happened.
translation.zh: -我怎么会让这种事发生？-过去的事不重要了

translation.en: What happens now is that you have to fight for her.
You have to fight for her like you fought for that stupid song contest.
translation.zh: 你得去努力争取她就像你为那个破歌唱大赛努力一样

translation.en: Fight for your dream of a life with her.
translation.zh: 跟她一起为实现梦想而努力！

translation.en: Sorry to disturb, but you two do know that Iceland made it into the Eurovison finals?
translation.zh: 抱歉打扰 但你们俩知道冰岛进入欧洲歌唱大赛决赛了吧？

translation.en: Why the hell didn't you tell me?
-Well, we have to turn the boat around. -No, we can't lose a day of fishing.
translation.zh: -那我们得赶紧掉头-不行 这样会损失一天的捕鱼量

translation.en: -[Erick] Go get her, Lars! -[man] Go get her!

translation.zh: 西格莉特 这不是结束

translation.en: Why don't you stay with me after the contest?
translation.zh: 比赛过后 不如你跟我在一起吧？

translation.en: Alexander, we barely know each other.
translation.zh: 亚历山大 我们都不怎么了解对方

translation.en: Yes, but you are beautiful and kind.
translation.zh: 对 但你又漂亮又善良

translation.en: I handsome and rich. This is typically very winning combination.
translation.zh: 我又帅又多金我们在一起绝对是最佳组合

translation.en: When we sing, I feel connection that is unique for me.
translation.zh: 我们一起唱歌时我能感受到我们之间与众不同的默契

translation.en: And if it helps, I can...
translation.zh: 如果你愿意 我可以…

translation.en: I don't really care about that stuff.
translation.zh: 我真的不在乎那些东西

translation.en: Victor. What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 维克多？你怎么会在这里？

translation.en: Can you give me a ride to the airport? We're in the finals of Eurovision.
translation.zh: 你能开车送我去机场吗？我们进欧洲歌唱大赛总决赛了

translation.en: Yes, I know this. Big news.
translation.zh: 嗯 我知道 这可是大消息

translation.en: I was swimming in the water.
-[Victor] Yes. -[Lars] Can you take me somewhere first?
translation.zh: -嗯-但你能先送我去一个地方吗？

translation.en: -There's something I need to take care of. -[Victor] Yeah.
And I just wanted to come up here to ask of you guys
for any help you can give me.
I don't know how I'm going to fix things with Sigrit, but I have to try.
translation.zh: 我不知道该如何跟西格莉特和好但我得去试试

translation.en: Have a good lunch, or whatever you're doing in there.
translation.zh: 祝你们午餐愉快或者不管你们在做什么

translation.en: Never understood why half this country still believes in elves.
translation.zh: 我一直都不明白为何半个国家的人还在信精灵

translation.en: I know, but Sigrit swears by them.
translation.zh: 我知道 但西格莉特超信的

translation.en: Iceland continues to have one foot in the Dark Ages, huh?
translation.zh: 冰岛还是有一只脚在黑暗时代 对吧？

translation.en: What are we going to do?
translation.zh: 我们什么时候才能长大？

translation.en: Don't you understand? If you go back to that stupid girl,
translation.zh: 你不明白吗？如果你去找那个傻姑娘

translation.en: you could win that contest, and we cannot have that!
translation.zh: 就有可能夺冠！我们可承担不起！

translation.en: And they will point the finger at me!
[choking] You really think we could win?
I blew up that boat! I killed all those people!
translation.zh: 是我炸掉的那艘船！是我杀了那些人！

translation.en: I'll just leave the knife here,
in case you have to do other murders!
translation.zh: 以免你还得杀死别的凶手！

translation.en: [Colin] Welcome to tonight's grand finale of the Eurovision Song Contest.
translation.zh: 欢迎收看今晚的欧洲歌唱大赛总决赛

translation.en: [Sasha] It is the biggest night of the year.
translation.zh: 这是今晚最重要的夜晚

translation.en: And the one we have all been waiting for.
translation.zh: 也是我们期待已久的一晚

translation.en: I-- I don't know. Do you?
I left him a couple of messages, but he never responded.
translation.zh: 我给他留了好几条留言 他都没回

translation.en: He's gonna be so bummed out if he misses this.
translation.zh: 他要是错过比赛 一定会很沮丧的

translation.en: Yes, if he's not here, he's gonna miss it.
translation.zh: 对 如果他不在 一定会错过

translation.en: Let the grand finale of the Eurovision Song Contest begin!
translation.zh: 欧洲歌唱大赛总决赛现在开始！

translation.en: -Where the hell is everyone? -At home, watching Eurovision.
translation.zh: -人都哪去了？-在家看欧洲歌唱大赛啊

translation.en: -That the guy from the fountain? -Oh, my God. What is he wearing?
translation.zh: -老天！他穿的是什么？-喷泉旁那个家伙？
嘿！美国佬 我最好的朋友

translation.en: New York Jets, right? Take my horse down to Old Town Road?
translation.zh: 纽约喷气机队 对吧？《骑马走在乡村古道》？

translation.en: Yes, I need a ride, okay?
translation.zh: 对 我得搭个车 好吗？
我们要去巴黎 兄弟

translation.en: No, Paris is a dump. You don't want to go there.
translation.zh: 别 巴黎就是个垃圾堆还是别去那里了
相信我 那地方很糟糕

translation.en: You need to take me to Eurovision Song Contest.
translation.zh: 你们得送我去欧洲歌唱大赛的现场

translation.en: Jamba Juice! Come on, let's go.
translation.zh: 坚宝果汁！行了 我们走

translation.en: Dude, this is a rental. I gotta take this back.
translation.zh: 伙计 这车是租来的 我得还回去

translation.en: -He's getting in the car? -Oh, my God.
Yeah, that's great. Close the door, close it.
translation.zh: 对 好极了 快关车门
-拜托 快走吧 兄弟-老天！

translation.en: I need to get to Sigrit. She goes on in ten minutes.
translation.zh: 我得去找西格莉特她还有10分钟就要上场了！

translation.en: And now the Russian performer, Alexander Lemtov.
translation.zh: 现在上场的是俄罗斯的表演者亚历山大莱姆托夫

translation.en: The favorite still, with his song "Lion of Love."
translation.zh: 他依然是我的最爱他为大家带来《狮子之爱》
杰夫 兄弟 开快点

translation.en: Put the pedal to the metal. Let's go!
translation.zh: 把油门踩到底 快点！

translation.en: There is no speed limit in all of Europe.
translation.zh: 整个欧洲就没有限速这一说

translation.en: They may be small, but you've got them.
translation.zh: 你的“胆”或许很小 但你肯定有

translation.en: ♪ I was happy laying 'round in the shadows Unbothered by flies ♪
translation.zh: 我开心地躺在阴影里 不为苍蝇烦恼

translation.en: ♪ Surrounded by so many That just didn’t light my fire ♪
translation.zh: 身边有莺莺燕燕但她们都点燃不了我内心的火焰

translation.en: ♪ Bu-hu-hut then I turned 'round and I saw a gazelle with a flirtatious smile ♪
translation.zh: 但当我转身看到一只带着媚笑的小羚羊

translation.en: ♪ Swift as the wind she was gone But you won't get away this time ♪
translation.zh: 她像风一般疾驰而去但你这次不会逃掉

translation.en: Can you let me out the car, please? This is scary. Just stop the car.
translation.zh: 能让我下车吗？这也太吓人了快停车

translation.en: You need to relax 'cause otherwise you're going to get thrown out on the next turn.
translation.zh: 你冷静点 不然到了下个转弯处你就会被丢出车外
杰夫 开车啊！继续开！

translation.en: ♪ I’ll be the king you wanted ♪
translation.zh: 我会成为你想要的国王

translation.en: ♪ You’ll be the queen I need ♪
translation.zh: 你会成为我需要的王后

translation.en: ♪ And on and on and on and on ♪
translation.zh: 永永远远 不休不止
转弯 杰夫 转弯！

translation.en: [woman] So, is Eurovision like The Voice?
translation.zh: 欧洲歌唱大赛就像《好声音》吗？

translation.en: [Lars] Would you shut up? No! It's not like The Voice.
translation.zh: 你能闭嘴吗？不是的！它跟《好声音》不一样

translation.en: Yes! Of course it is, you shithead!
translation.zh: 对！当然是 你个白痴！

translation.en: It says Eurovision right on it. Don't slow down!
translation.zh: 上面写着欧洲歌唱大赛呢别减速啊！

translation.en: ♪ I will make you rise up ♪
♪ You’ll know, you'll know I’m done ♪
♪ Will meet the lion of love ♪
♪ Will meet the lion of love ♪
♪ Will meet the lion of love ♪
-Yes! We made it! Eurovision. -Oh, my God.
translation.zh: -真棒！我们成功了！欧洲歌唱大赛-我的天

translation.en: All right. Hey! Thank you, Americans! You're awful people! Ha-ha!
translation.zh: 好了 嘿！谢谢你们 美国佬！你们真是糟透了！

translation.en: No, but seriously! Don't come to Iceland!
translation.zh: 不 但说真的！千万别去冰岛！

translation.en: We don't want you! You might be killed by elves!
translation.zh: 我们不喜欢你们！你们可能会被精灵杀死！

translation.en: Oh! Tonight we conquer stage, tomorrow the world.
translation.zh: 今晚我们征服舞台明天我们就去征服世界！

translation.en: Um... uh... Lemtov, I need to ask you something.
translation.zh: 莱姆托夫 我得问你一件事

translation.en: No! No, no! Of course not. I am Russian.
translation.zh: 不是！当然不是 我可是俄罗斯人

translation.en: Statistically speaking, I think that's impossible.
translation.zh: 但从数据上来说 我认为有这个可能
-我向你保证 我百分百不是-性别酷儿呢？

translation.en: Fact of truth. No gay Russian.
translation.zh: 这是事实 俄罗斯没有基佬
-也不是非二元性别？-不 不是的 我是百分百直男

translation.en: so a lot has happened since I came here, and--
translation.zh: 我来这里后发生了很多事 然后…

translation.en: Shh. We talk about this later time.
You go, sing your heart out.
I am here, Corin, the green room, where only the artists can sit...
translation.zh: 科林 我在休息室歌手们都坐在这里…
-拉斯…-不行 拜托 我要迟到了

translation.en: Lars, please. You must listen to me.
translation.zh: 拉斯 拜托 你必须听我说

translation.en: Victor Karlosson killed me. He blew me up on the boat
translation.zh: 维克多卡洛森害死了我他炸毁了我所在的船

translation.en: and now he's going to try to kill you.
Have you not been using your ghost powers to watch anything that's happening?
translation.zh: 你就没用自己的妖力看看都发生了什么吗？
他已经试过了 他死了
-什么？-对 他已经试过杀我了

translation.en: Yeah. So, like, come on. Seriously. Thank you so much. Is that it?
translation.zh: 嗯 拜托！说真的 非常感谢你你还有别的话要说吗？

translation.en: She's not a very helpful ghost.
translation.zh: 她这个鬼一点忙都没帮上

translation.en: [Graham] It appears only one half of Fire Saga will be performing tonight.
translation.zh: 看来火焰传说今晚只有一人演唱

translation.en: Why are you laughing? I'm trying to have a fist fight with you!
translation.zh: 你笑什么？我要跟你拳斗！

translation.en: You hit me but it's very light.
translation.zh: 你的拳头打到我身上就像棉花一样

translation.en: You are the one who should stay away.
Comfort, security, mansion, palace, Wi-Fi every room.
translation.zh: 舒适的生活、安全感、豪宅皇宫、每个房间都有无线网
你能给她什么？你什么都给不了

translation.en: Stop. Stop, stop the music, please! Stop. Stop.
translation.zh: 停下 音乐停止！拜托了！停下

translation.en: Here we go. Another adventure with the Icelanders.
translation.zh: 又来了 跟冰岛人再次一起冒险

translation.en: My name is Lars Erickssong from Iceland.
translation.zh: 我叫拉斯埃里克松 我来自冰岛

translation.en: And I’m sorry to be messing up the show.
I shouldn’t. I... I love this show.
translation.zh: 我不该这么做的 我超喜欢这个节目

translation.en: The Eurovision Song Contest means everything to me.
translation.zh: 欧洲歌唱大赛对我来说意味着一切

translation.en: Ever since I was a small child,
I always dreamed of winning the contest.
translation.zh: 我就一直梦想在大赛上夺冠

translation.en: as most of you know, Eurovision is much more than a competition.
translation.zh: 大多数人也知道欧洲歌唱大赛不仅仅是一场比赛

translation.en: The music is not a contest.
translation.zh: 音乐的意义也不在于比赛

translation.en: And the perfect song isn't the winning song,
translation.zh: 最完美的歌曲不是能夺冠的歌曲

translation.en: but a song that comes from the heart.
translation.zh: 而是抒发真情实意的歌曲

translation.en: ♪ With this great big world before me ♪
♪ But it's all for someone else ♪
♪ To let you know just where my heart is ♪
♪ To tell the truth and not pretend ♪
translation.zh: 说出实话 不再假装

translation.en: ♪ Just to realize That I was meant to stay ♪
translation.zh: 我刚明白我注定要留下来

translation.en: ♪ Where the mountains sing Through the screams of seagulls ♪
translation.zh: 留在山峦通过海鸥的尖叫声发出阵阵歌声的地方

translation.en: ♪ Where the whales can live 'Cause they’re gentle people ♪
translation.zh: 在鲸鱼可以自在生活的地方因为那里有温柔的人

translation.en: ♪ Thought I made it clear Do I have to say it? ♪
translation.zh: 我以为你已经明白我的心意我必须说出口吗？

translation.en: ♪ It was always there We just didn’t see it ♪
translation.zh: 爱意一直都在 我们只是没看到

translation.en: ♪ All I need is you and me And my home... ♪
translation.zh: 我只需要你和我在一起还有我的家乡…

translation.en: ♪ All the neon lights and billboards ♪
♪ To be seen and to be heard ♪
translation.zh: 你希望被看到 被听到

translation.en: ♪ But now I know what makes me happy ♪
translation.zh: 但现在我明白了什么能让我开心

translation.en: ♪ And I can tell you feel it too ♪
translation.zh: 我能看出来 你也感受到了

translation.en: ♪ Where the mountains sing Through the screams of seagulls ♪
translation.zh: 留在山峦通过海鸥的尖叫声发出阵阵歌声的地方

translation.en: ♪ Where the whales can live 'Cause they’re gentle people ♪
translation.zh: 在鲸鱼可以自在生活的地方因为那里有温柔的人

translation.en: ♪ Where the northern lights Burst out their colors ♪
♪ And the magic nights Surpass all others and... ♪
translation.zh: 神奇的夜晚超越一切时光…

translation.en: They will, of course, be disqualified for changing their song,
